p: All mice i.i. with B/2017 virus survived and showed no obvious clinical signs such as body weight or temperature changes ( Figure 2A,B). In contrast, another experimental group of mice i.i. with B/2017-MA showed gradually weight loss: approximately 10% at 3 d.p.i.; 15% at 4 d.p.i.; 20% at 5 d.p.i.; 25% at 6 d.p.i.; and 30% at 7 d.p.i. ( Figure 2A). Temperature measurements indicated the peak infection time frame to be from the 4th to the 7th d.p.i. ( Figure 2B).
